}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "8WUSG05..2A1" and "0505" is silkscreened on the board. {{see also|Alpha Networks}} The device is probably a [[Alpha Networks WUS-G05]] :([[D-Link DWL-G122 rev B1]]) or similar Alpha device. Assumed RT2571 device (uses RT2500 Windows drivers).
